developer: PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED
description:
Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing 

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!

With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months 
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy 
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary

and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information: 
•	Baby development,
•	Mother’s body,
•	Mom’s meals,
•	Useful tips.
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

As a prominent milestone of excellence, OQIC which is one of the leading life and medical insurers in the middle east has launched one-of-a-kind mobile app. It is a unique new way of how you interact with your medical Insurance requirements. Developed by a team of insurance professionals and experienced developers, OQIC app will grant you an access to a bouquet of innovative services in which you can easily submit and track your claims, order medications, set up reminders for medicine administration, create your own health records, voice or text complains to OQIC team and many other rich interactions. Using your GPS function, no matter where you are, OQIC will guide you to locate the nearest direct billing providers with all their contact details. Experience the easy way to interact with your insurer!

Avicen - On-Demand Delivery for Cosmetics & OTC Essentials

Your trusted partner for skincare, beauty, wellness, and everyday essentials—delivered fast and hassle-free.

Discover a smarter way to shop for your favourite cosmetics and over-the-counter (OTC) products with Avicen. From grooming and beauty to baby care and wellness, we bring genuine, verified products right to your doorstep with just a few taps.

Why Shoppers Choose Avicen?

• Multiple Delivery Options: Choose the option that fits your schedule: Quick Shipment, In-Store Pickup, or Scheduled Delivery for your convenience. 

• Extensive Product Range: Explore 20+ categories featuring top brands in skincare, cosmetics, wellness, and personal care. 

• User-Friendly Interface: Easily search, add items to your cart, and check out securely in seconds. 

• Real-Time Order Updates: Get instant updates on your app and via email every step of the way. 

• Dedicated Customer Support: Reach our support team quickly via WhatsApp or phone call—we're here to help. 

• Safe & Reliable: We deliver only 100% genuine products from trusted, verified sources.

No more queues. No more waiting.
 Just tap, order, and relax—Avicen takes care of the rest.

Whether it’s your skincare routine, baby essentials, or last-minute wellness needs, Avicen makes self-care and everyday shopping effortless.

Download the Avicen App Today and experience the future of on-demand beauty, wellness, and OTC shopping!

IMPORTANT MEDICAL DISCLAIMER: 
The Avicen app provides general product and delivery information only. It is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider with any questions regarding medical conditions or before using any medication, including OTC products. Do not ignore or delay medical advice based on information provided through the app.

We Are Here !!!

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more 
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour

Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus

Lumi – Your Trusted Health Companion
 
 
Whether you’re an Allianz-insured member, Nextcare-insured, or covered under a Nextcare-managed policy, Lumi makes managing your insurance effortless—your policy, benefits, and claims are just one tap away.
 
 
With Lumi, you can easily:
 
 
Download Your Digital Health Insurance Card for seamless access
 
Check Your Policy Benefits anytime, anywhere
 
Submit & Track Claims with ease
 
Easy Claims Processing: hassle-free reimbursement and preapproval processes
 
Lumi brings healthcare home with a caring Digital Health Assistant, 24/7 doctor access, easy appointment booking, AI-powered symptom checking, and convenient medication delivery.
 
 
Submit & Track Medical Claims Hassle-Free
 
Managing insurance claims is easier than ever. Upload your medical documents, submit your claim, and track its progress—all within the app. Once approved, receive reimbursements through your preferred payment method without unnecessary delays.
 
 
Take Charge of Your Health with Lumi’s Digital Services
 
We know your health is more than just insurance. Lumi offers a suite of digital health services designed to support your well-being.
 
 
Check Your Symptoms with Confidence
 
Lumi’s AI-powered Symptom Checker is an EU-certified medical device providing fast, reliable health insights. Whether you’re experiencing mild discomfort or unusual symptoms, this tool helps you assess your condition and make informed decisions—all from home or office.
 
 
Talk to a Doctor whenever you need
 
With Lumi’s Teleconsultation Service, expert multilingual doctors are just a tap away. Speak with doctors via secure video calls for consultations, prescription refills, and lab test requests.
 
 
Doctor Chat – Instant Medical Advice
 
Need quick guidance? Lumi’s Doctor Chat connects you to certified doctors via live chat, providing real-time answers to your non-emergency health concerns. With over 1,000 doctors available 24/7 in 13 languages across 19 countries, you’ll receive trusted advice whenever needed.
 
 
Private & Secure
 
Your medical information is handled with the highest confidentiality, ensuring a safe healthcare experience.
 
 
Get Your Medications Delivered to Your Door
 
Skip pharmacy lines with Lumi’s Medication Delivery Service—receive your prescribed medicines without hassle. Place your order through the app and have your medications delivered to your doorstep.
 
 
Find & Book Appointments with Ease
 
Need to see a doctor in person? Lumi’s Appointment Booking Service makes it easier than ever. Search from Over 21,000 Providers – Find doctors, clinics, hospitals, and pharmacies covered under your insurance. Filter by Specialty, Location & Network – Choose the right provider based on your needs.
 
 
Lumi connects you to quality care effortlessly—so you can focus on what matters most.
 
 
Get Instant Support with Zoe, Your Virtual Assistant
 
Need help navigating your insurance benefits or checking your claim status? Zoe, Lumi’s friendly virtual assistant, is available 24/7 to provide instant answers. It can help you find in-network healthcare providers, check claim status, and connect you to our Care Center for further assistance.
 
 
Why Lumi?
 
Simple to Use – Access essential features instantly and make the most of your policy. Fast & Efficient – Manage your healthcare quickly and easily. Seamless Access – Enjoy reliable, trustworthy healthcare services from home or office.
 
 
About Lumi
 
Lumi is designed to make healthcare simpler, smarter, and more accessible. Combining expertise with digital health innovations, we’re committed to supporting you every step of your healthcare journey. What sets Lumi apart is our focus on simplifying insurance management so you can concentrate on your health and life. Download Lumi today and experience a healthcare journey that fits your lifestyle.

The FreeStyle LibreLink app is approved for use with FreeStyle Libre and FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors. You can check your glucose by scanning your sensor with your phone. Now FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensor users can get automatic glucose readings in the FreeStyle LibreLink app, updated every minute, and also receive alarms when your glucose is low or high. [1][2]

You can use the FreeStyle LibreLink app to:

* View your current glucose reading, trend arrow and glucose history
* Receive low or high glucose alarms with FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors [2]
* Add notes to track your food, insulin use and exercise
* See reports, such as Time in Range and Daily Patterns
* Share your data with your doctor and family, with your permission [3]

SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY
Compatibility may vary between phones and operating systems. Learn more about compatible phones at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

USING YOUR APP AND READER WITH THE SAME SENSOR
Alarms can only be issued on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader or your phone (not both). To receive alarms on your phone, you must start the sensor with the app. To receive alarms on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader, you must start the sensor with your reader. Once the sensor has been started with the reader, you can also scan that sensor with your phone.

Remember that the app and reader do not share data with each other. For complete information on a device, scan your sensor every eight hours with that device; otherwise, your reports will not include all your data. You can upload and view data from all of your devices on LibreView.com.

APP INFORMATION
FreeStyle LibreLink is intended for measuring glucose levels in people with diabetes when used with a sensor. For more information on how to use FreeStyle LibreLink, refer to the User’s Manual, which can be accessed through the app. If you require a printed User’s Manual, contact Abbott Diabetes Care Customer Support.

Consult a healthcare professional to confirm if this product is right for you or if you have questions about how to use this product to make treatment decisions.

Learn more at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

[1] If you are using the FreeStyle LibreLink app, you must also have access to a blood glucose monitoring system, as the app does not provide one.  

[2] Alarms that you receive do not include your glucose reading, so you must scan your sensor to check your glucose.

[3] Use of FreeStyle LibreLink and LibreLinkUp requires registration with LibreView.

The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

For additional legal notices and terms of use, go to http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

========

To resolve any technical or Customer Service issues that you are having with a FreeStyle Libre product, please contact FreeStyle Libre Customer Service directly.

*** Most downloaded Contraction Timer app in the world! Number 1 in the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Italy and elsewhere! ***

This is the simplest-to-use contraction timer. The app will help to track your contractions and determine when it's time to go to the hospital.
If you plan on having a home birth, the app will tell you what stage of labor you are in at any given moment.

Keep track of your labor by tapping a single button at the start and at the end of each contraction. The Contraction Timer analyzes the duration and frequency of contractions and will notify you when it's time to go to the hospital.

Thousands of pregnant women around the world have become mothers using our app.

Always consult your doctor to orient yourself in terms of contraction frequency and duration.
This app is not a medical device and our recomendations are based on standard indicators. Your labor may occur differently. Therefore, do not rely exclusively on our app.
If the duration and frequency of contractions do not yet correspond to the necessary indicators but labor pains become unbearable, it is better to go to the hospital as soon as possible rather than give birth at home or on the way there. Trust what your body is telling you.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at neumandev@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important to us.

Chefaa App makes it easy for you to get all your needs from the pharmacy, You can order your medications and non-pharmaceuticals online and get your order delivered to your doorstep.

Chefaa app uses GPS to connect patients and pharmacies to help patients get all their pharmacy needs to their homes.

* With Chefaa App you can:
1. order medications online
After visiting the doctor and paying your Vezeeta fee, you usually go to the pharmacy to get your medications.But instead of searching multiple pharmacies and waiting in long queues, you can conveniently order them through the Chefaa online pharmacy app in Egypt and KSA.
Chefaa medicine ordering app provides two ways to order medicine:
- Scan or upload your prescription, medication bottle, or box picture, then submit your request.
- You can search for your medication (dawaya) in chefaa store, then add it to the shopping cart and confirm the order.

Within minutes, you’ll receive a notification with your order status and the estimated delivery time based on availability in nearby pharmacies.


2. Order care products and medical supplies online

You can easily order non-medicinal products such as skincare, hair care, and baby care products through the Chefaa Egypt app or KSA app in two ways: 
- Upload the picture of the product you want to Chefaa application, then confirm the order.
- Browse the Chefaa store, select your desired product, add it to your cart, and confirm your order.

* Chefaa services :
1. instant delivery
Order your medication online and have it delivered to your address within 90 minutes from the nearest pharmacy.
2. Big Save
Enjoy 15% off your order with free delivery within 48 hours. 
Through the Chefaa dawaey app, your order will be securely processed and delivered by a pharmacy in Egypt or Saudi Arabia.
3. Ask a pharmacist
Get 24/7 access to a specialized pharmacist who can answer your inquiries and assist you with ordering medicine online.

4. Medication reminder
Stay on track with your medication schedule and avoid risks associated with missed doses.
With this reminder feature, you can:
Add the medication name (dawaya).
Include notes on how to take it
Set dosage and appointment reminders

5. Chefaa blog
Access a wealth of health information, including articles on diseases, medications (dawaa yodawy almrd) , nutrition, pregnancy, motherhood, and skincare & haircare tips.


* With Chefaa online pharmacy delivery app you can safely :
- Order medicine online by uploading or scanning your prescription (elroshetta).
- Get your medication (al-dawaa) delivered from the nearest pharmacy to your doorstep with just a few clicks.
- Search for medicine (dawa Misr /dawa in Saudi Arabia) online and locate any medication you couldn’t find elsewhere.
- Choose the most convenient payment method for you—pay online or cash on delivery.
- Enjoy 24/7 medicine delivery, even on holidays with Chefaa app.
- Communicate with a pharmacist directly whenever needed.
- Have your pharmacy order (dawaey or cosmetics) delivered immediately or schedule it for later.
- Track your order status in real-time until it reaches your doorstep

Order your medications easily with the most user-friendly online pharmacy delivery app in Egypt and Saudi Arabia, connecting pharmacies and patients seamlessly.

Do you want to know more?
Visit our website: www.chefaa.com

صمم تطبيق تشايلدرو خبراء واستشاريي نوم الأطفال للأمهات ليساعد على تنظيم نوم أطفالهن سواء نهارًأ بتنظيم القيلولات أو ليلًا بالتدريج بالإضافة إلى المساعدة على تنظيم وتقليل الرضعات والنوم في سرير منفصل عن الوالدين للوصول إلى نوم عميق وصحي.
 تدريب نوم الأطفال الرضع
تشايلدرو هو أول تطبيق عربي يساعد الأمهات على تنظيم ساعات نوم الأطفال الرضع بشكل علمي وآمن من خلال طرق ناجحة وتدريجية بدون الإعتماد على أساليب سريعة تزيد من بكاء الرضع.
مناسب للأطفال من سن 0 وحتى 3 سنوات
لدينا برامج متنوعة لتنظيم النوم بالتدريج وتقليل الرضعات لتناسب عمر طفلك وشخصيته وظروف بيتك أي أنك ستحصلين على خطة مخصصة تلائمك تمامًا وتلائم طفلك.
 جدول يومي تفاعلي
فقط بإدخال موعد استيقاظ طفلك يوميًا سيساعدك التطبيق على معرفة أفضل الأوقات المناسبة للنوم والأكل واللعب من خلال الجدول الذكي.وبالإضافة لذلك ستجدين قوائم عمل يومية حسب البرنامج الخاص بطفلك. 
 مدربيي واستشاريي نوم معتمدين
لدينا مدربيي ومقدمي رعاية للأطفال معتمدين من استراليا للأطفال حديثي الولادة وحتى سن 5 سنوات لذلك نقدم حلول وبرامج فعالة تناسب طفلك لنصل معًا إلى هدفك بشكل علمي وآمن.
 ليالي هادئة لكِ ولطفلك
زيادة ساعات النوم عند الأطفال والحصول على ليالي هادئة ونوم صحي ليس أمرًا مستحيلًا. فالتطبيق يساعدك على معرفة أفضل طريقة لجعل طفلك ينام بشكل متواصل من 8-10 ساعات يوميًا خلال الليل في وقت قياسي.
 دعم ومساعدة طوال الوقت
يهمنا نجاح برنامج النوم ومساندتك طوال الوقت لذا يمكنك التواصل مع استشاري نوم الأطفال بسهولة وطلب المساعدة في جميع الأوقات من خلال خدمة الرسائل وبضغطة زر واحدة.
في تشايلدرو نهدف بأن ترين مع الوقت من خلال النتائج أنه من الممكن علاج اضطرابات النوم عند الأطفال والوصول إلى النوم العميق عند الأطفال باتباع خطوات بسيطة وأن طفلك واحد من هؤلاء الأطفال ويمكن تدريبه بسهولة  
جربي التطبيق الآن!

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.



GOLD STATUS IN THE APP
- The subscription costs $1.99 per month
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Private Policy - https://wachanga.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://wachanga.com/terms

MDCalc is the leading clinical decision support app providing 900+ evidence-based calculators, risk scores, and clinical tools to support patient care at the bedside. MDCalc has been trusted by millions of clinicians since 2005.

Why Clinicians Choose MDCalc:

• Created by Physicians, for Physicians - All tools developed and validated by board-certified physicians  
• 900+ Clinical Tools - Risk scores, algorithms, dosing calculators, and more with consistent updates and new tools added regularly 
• Works Offline - Full functionality without internet connection  
• Evidence-Based - Every tool includes research validation and expert commentary  
• CME Tracking - Earn CME just by reading through the clinical content surrounding many of our tools
• Free Registration - Complete access in under 30 seconds  

Key Features:

Smart Search & Organization
• Quick search across all tools
• Customizable favorites and specialty lists
• Recently used tools for quick access
• Auto-sync between web and mobile
• Explore page for personalized suggestions

Clinical Expertise
• Expert insights from creators
• Pearls & pitfalls from specialists
• Evidence summaries with PubMed links
• Error warnings and normal value ranges

Workflow Support
• Toggle between US and SI units instantly
• Works in limited connectivity settings
• Easy to use at the point-of-care

Popular Tools Include:
• Creatinine Clearance - Cockcroft-Gault Equation
• HA2DS2-VASc Score - Atrial Fibrillation Stroke Risk
• HEART Score- Major Cardiac Events
• Wells' Criteria - Pulmonary Embolism & DVT
• MELD Score - End-Stage Liver Disease
• HAS-BLED Score - Major Bleeding Risk
• SIRS/Sepsis Criteria - Septic Shock Assessment
• Mean Arterial Pressure - Hemodynamic Monitoring


MDCalc ensures only the highest-quality, clinically relevant tools make it into the app. Each calculator undergoes rigorous evidence appraisal and validation by our network of academic and practicing physician experts.

This will provide you with an access to our complete network within the GCC region. 

Making a medical appointment is now much more convenient through this free to install app, which safe and secure. The installation and sign up process is simple.

Download and install the app to immediately book appointments with our doctors and gain access to KIMSHEALTH’s care. All users make use of a variety of tools features in the app’s dashboard and get comprehensive insights into your health profile. 

Once you have completed your registration process through the app, you can – book or request an appointment, access Patient Portal to view your medical records, check out the latest preventive health packages, and retrieve your medical test  and radiology results and records in addition to the viewing and managing your prescriptions securely and safely through the app. 

Key Features Include:

	•	Find your Doctor and learn about many well-experienced, certified physicians who are for our patients. 
	•	Discover more about our model of care and get health tips from our blogs.
	•	Request and track your appointments. 
	•	View your health history and medication.
	•	View your latest test and radiology results. 
	•	Receive helpful reminders
	•	Connect your account to Apple or Samsung health to pull health-related data from your personal device right into the app. 

The KIMSHEALTH app will continue to add regular updates to aiming to build one of the most interactive and innovative services available in the GCC region. 

To provide suggestions or feedback on the app, please get in touch with +973 17246800 or email to marketing@kimshealth.bh

With the AHA eBook Reader you can read all your American Heart Association (AHA) eBooks online, offline or anytime on your mobile device.

You can log into this eBook reader using the same account information as your AHA account.

How to add AHA eBooks to your AHA eBook Reader
1. Open your AHA eBook Reader.
2. Authorize your eBook Reader using your account information from the AHA eBooks website.
3. Your Bookshelf will show all your purchased books.
4. Click on the title you want to download to your eBook Reader. Your download will start automatically.
5. After download is complete, click on that title to read your eBook on your mobile device.

With your AHA eBook Reader, you can 
- Search in titles
- Sort by category
- Add bookmarks
- Change the font size
- Jump within the text between chapters
- Jump within text to figures, tables, references.
- Preview other AHA eBooks

The American Heart Association is the nation’s oldest, largest voluntary organization devoted to fighting cardiovascular diseases and stroke.

The Micromedex suite is a current, reliable, and robust solution to support informed clinical decisions with fast access to the latest evidence-based insights at the point of care. The impartial clinical content is updated daily and vetted through an accredited review process.

The Micromedex app provides Drug Reference summary, NeoFax and Pediatric reference, IV Compatibility, and Drug Interactions information along with a set of clinical calculators and access to the Micromedex Assistant.


What you will experience:

– Unified Access: Access to all essential drug information from a single, comprehensive app

– Ease of Navigation: User-friendly interface for easy access to information

– Ease of Maintenance: Experience automated content updates so you can stay focused on your workflow


App Activation Instructions:

To successfully activate, your device needs to remain online.

For quick and efficient downloading, remain within your facility Wi-Fi network.


1. Download the “Micromedex” app. The app will download to your app library or directly to your device.

2. Open the app, an activation code and an activation link will display on your device.

  a. Follow the link from your app. Enter your Micromedex login credentials, if required.

    OR

  b. Enter www.micromedexsolutions.com/activate in your desktop browser

  c. In your Micromedex desktop application, navigate to the Mobile Application Access tab and open the Mobile app access instructions and follow the provided link to the activation page.

3. Enter the provided activation code and tap “Activate Device” to begin using the app.

Data loaded in IDV (IMAIOS DICOM Viewer) isn't uploaded on the network to ensure storage safety and security of personal health information of the patients (excluding use of sharing features).
IDV supports DICOM files of all types (ultrasound, scanner, MRI, PET, etc.) and offers several fast and intuitive tools such as scrolling, image manipulation and measurement.
It allows you to easily open any file stored on your device or accessible online for quick viewing whenever you want.
Completely free for personal and non-commercial use, IDV is also accessible in its online version on the website www.imaios.com.

Caution: IDV has not been tested or certified for clinical use. It is NOT approved as a medical device. It cannot be used for primary diagnosis in medical imaging.

Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.

Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!

Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!

Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates

TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS
Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.

IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE
Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.

PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER
Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.

NEW CHALLENGES 
Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!

LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS
Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide. 

EARN CME CREDIT
Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.

Have a new glucometer, but don't have a device to record your measurements?

This app allows you to keep track of your blood sugar level on a daily basis. It's very simple, just record the measurements ​​and check the statistics over time.

Note: The app need to have an external device (such as glucometer) to record blood sugar level.

Disclaimer: This app only records blood glucose values and does not assess, interpret, or validate the readings; always consult a healthcare professional for medical advice.

LibreLinkUp allows you to monitor and support people who are using a FreeStyle Libre sensor and compatible FreeStyle Libre app. You can link up by asking them to invite you in their app. 

Whether you’re a family member, friend or co-worker, the LibreLinkUp app helps you monitor and support people in your life so they can better manage their diabetes. You can use the LibreLinkUp app to view their glucose with a quick glance of your phone if they’re using a FreeStyle Libre sensor and app. 

Innovations include:

GLUCOSE HISTORY AND INSIGHTS: Touch the glucose graph to see recent history, or review a logbook of glucose scans [2] and alarms [3, 4] – so you can better understand glucose patterns 
GLUCOSE ALARMS: Receive alerts when glucose is high or low, so you can help them take action [3, 4]
SENSOR ALERTS Get notified when a new sensor is started, and when a sensor and app lose connectivity [3, 4]
DARK MODE: View glucose data in lower-light conditions, whether it’s in a cinema or the middle of the night 



In order to protect your privacy and personal information, this app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. Instead, please visit us at www.librelinkup.com/support to view support information, and select ‘Contact Support’ to directly submit your comment to our support team if you are unable to find an answer to your concern.


[1] Both your LibreLinkUp app and the Freestyle Libre user’s app must be connected to the Internet in order share glucose information.
[2] Requires use of FreeStyle Libre sensors
[3] Requires use of FreeStyle Libre 2 or FreeStyle Libre 3 sensors.
[4] Certain features or capabilities may not be available in all countries.
